snippet: Amid onset of across-the-board spending cuts and an impasse with Republican leaders, President Obama is looking to rank-and-file Republican senators.
abstract: Amid onset of across-the-board spending cuts and an impasse with Republican leaders, President Obama is looking to rank-and-file Republican senators.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and JACKIE CALMES

headline.main: Obama Recruits Republicans for Budget Talks With Personal Calls
